{"fixed_xml":"

6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergasse sind zu verkauffen:

Prideaun A. und N. Testam in einer Connex. mit der Völker-Historie Berlin 1725 4. II. Tom. 1. Vol. 2 Cattenburg Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas Amst. 1737 4. Bibl. 8r. 70. Interpp. Reineccii Lips. 1737 8º. Bibl. Hebr. punctata Leusdenii Frf. 1694 12. Seldenus de Diis Syris Lips. 1692 8. Gottschedens critische Dichtkunst Leipzig 1737 8vo. Bödickers Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach Berlin 1729 8vo. ","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1) Added

and

tags to wrap the introductory sentence. 2) Closed the second element (it had been left open, causing illegal nesting). 3) Split what had been nested/concatenated catalogue items into seven independent blocks. 4) Escaped the bare ampersand in “… Vita & Scriptis …” to &. 5) Introduced to hold the phrase “in einer Connex. …” that was outside any tag. 6) Normalised garbled UTF-8 sequences (√, ∂, ≤, etc.) to the intended characters (ß, ö, º, etc.). 7) Harmonised abbreviations inside and and completed several missing full stops so every element is properly closed and the XML is now well-formed."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
6. Bey Herrn Haag an der Augustinergasse sind zu verkauffen:

Prideaun A. und N. Testam in einer Connex. mit der Völker-Historie Berlin 1725 4. II. Tom. 1. Vol. 2 Cattenburg Sapientia Mos. de Vita & Scriptis Mosis contra Deistas Amst. 1737 4. Bibl. 8r. 70. Interpp. Reineccii Lips. 1737 8º. Bibl. Hebr. punctata Leusdenii Frf. 1694 12. Seldenus de Diis Syris Lips. 1692 8. Gottschedens critische Dichtkunst Leipzig 1737 8vo. Bödickers Grundsätze der Deutschen Sprach Berlin 1729 8vo.
parsed.explanation:
1) Added

and

tags to wrap the introductory sentence. 2) Closed the second element (it had been left open, causing illegal nesting). 3) Split what had been nested/concatenated catalogue items into seven independent blocks. 4) Escaped the bare ampersand in “… Vita & Scriptis …” to &. 5) Introduced to hold the phrase “in einer Connex. …” that was outside any tag. 6) Normalised garbled UTF-8 sequences (√, ∂, ≤, etc.) to the intended characters (ß, ö, º, etc.). 7) Harmonised abbreviations inside and and completed several missing full stops so every element is properly closed and the XML is now well-formed.
